items.summary:
# 苹果2026年Mac产品计划展望

根据最新消息，苹果计划在2026年对其大部分Mac产品线进行重大更新，核心将是M5芯片的普及，并有可能在年末首次推出M6芯片。此次更新将涵盖从MacBook Air到Mac Studio的广泛产品。

![苹果芯片Mac产品线2024特色紫色M5](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Md4RtRfGCJ3k3b9gi1_jW30Qzuo=/400x0/article-new/2024/12/apple-silicon-mac-lineup-2024-feature-purple-m5.jpg?lossy)

### 芯片展望

*   **M5芯片：** 预计2026年大部分Mac产品将升级到M5芯片。
*   **M6芯片：** 有望在2026年末首次亮相，可能首先应用于OLED MacBook Pro。

### MacBook系列

#### MacBook Air (2026年初)

*   将是2026年首批获得更新的Mac之一。
*   搭载与14英寸MacBook Pro相同的M5芯片。
*   可能获得与M5 MacBook Pro相同的SSD升级。

![M4 MacBook Air 紫色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/5JUobGr_xKqxaax6NuYysZvST1Q=/400x0/article-new/2025/05/m4-macbook-air-purple.jpeg?lossy)

#### 低成本MacBook (2026年初)

*   苹果计划在2026年推出一款价格低于999美元MacBook Air的低成本MacBook。
*   **显示屏：** 约13英寸，可能略小于13.6英寸MacBook Air。标准LCD显示屏，不支持mini-LED或ProMotion。
*   **芯片：** 搭载A18 Pro芯片（首次出现在iPhone 16 Pro中），采用苹果第二代3纳米工艺，配备8GB RAM并支持Apple Intelligence。
*   **颜色：** 可能提供多种鲜艳颜色，如银色、蓝色、粉色和黄色，类似于iMac。
*   **定位：** 作为Mac产品线中新的经济实惠选项，不会取代MacBook Air。
*   **发布时间：** 预计2026年上半年。

![A18 Pro MacBook 缩略图](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7LEaBXv7EVbAzefyBDXCoItGJhg=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/A18-Pro-MacBook-Thumb.jpg?lossy)

#### MacBook Pro (2026年初)

*   在14英寸M5 MacBook Pro已发布的基础上，更高端的M5 Pro和M5 Max芯片型号预计将在与MacBook Air和低成本MacBook大致相同的时间段推出。
*   **芯片：** M5 Pro和M5 Max将提供更多的CPU核心和更强的GPU，以提升性能。
*   **尺寸：** 提供14英寸和16英寸机型。
*   **存储：** 预计将增加更快的SSD。

![MacBook Pro 紫色 二月](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Nw2DVB9vYp7l1SGLQP3Nv9ds8ew=/400x0/article-new/2024/02/macbook-pro-purple-february.jpg?lossy)

#### OLED MacBook Pro (2026年末)

*   除了2026年初的M5 Pro/Max刷新，苹果还在开发一款全新的OLED MacBook Pro。
*   **核心特性：** 采用下一代M6芯片技术，并首次集成触控屏幕。
*   **发布时间：** 预计2026年末或2027年初，2026年仍有可能。如果2026年发布，将是MacBook Pro一年内两次更新的罕见情况。
*   **设计：**
    *   采用无刘海的打孔摄像头，最大化显示区域。
    *   屏幕首次支持触控，并采用加固铰链，确保触控时屏幕稳定。
    *   更薄、更轻的机身设计。
    *   保留键盘和触控板，触控手势将增强现有功能。
*   **M6芯片：** 可能基于台积电2纳米工艺，带来速度和效率的显著提升，在不牺牲性能的情况下延长电池续航。
*   **连接性：** 有望成为首款集成5G连接的MacBook，搭载C2芯片（苹果第二代自研调制解调器），支持mmWave和sub-6GHz 5G速度。

![OLED MacBook Pro 特色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/byfjvusNNYKrZiSiCN3MfRa5O9Q=/400x0/article-new/2021/03/OLED-Macbook-Pro-Feature.jpg?lossy)

### Mac台式机与显示器

#### Mac显示器 (2026年初至年中)

*   自2022年Studio Display发布以来，苹果尚未推出新显示器。目前有两款新显示器正在开发中，计划于2026年发布。
*   **下一代Studio Display：**
    *   可能保持27英寸屏幕尺寸。
    *   升级为mini-LED技术，而非LCD，带来更好的HDR、亮度、对比度和色彩表现。
    *   内部芯片可能升级为iPhone 17 Pro中使用的A19 Pro。
*   **产品线：** 尚不清楚这两款显示器是不同尺寸的Studio Display，还是Studio Display和更昂贵的Pro Display XDR的继任者。

![Studio Display 紫色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/ox_S50IsbNHVO6mTL0aNiQxtbuw=/400x0/article-new/2025/02/studio-display-purple.jpeg?lossy)

#### Mac mini (2026年中)

*   据彭博社的Mark Gurman透露，Mac mini的更新版本可能在2026年中左右推出。
*   **芯片：** 将搭载M5和M5 Pro芯片。
*   **设计：** 目前没有设计变更的传闻。

![M4 Mini 蓝色和紫色发光](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Wy7Oz_xonTiW1I3RnV9i0IX0id0=/400x0/article-new/2024/10/M4-mini-Glowing-Blue-and-Purple.jpg?lossy)

#### Mac Studio (2026年中)

*   Mac Studio有望与Mac mini在同一时间段发布。
*   **芯片：** 苹果未发布M4 Ultra芯片，因此没有M4 Ultra Mac Studio。但将推出M5 Ultra型号。
*   **性能：** 将搭载M5 Max和M5 Ultra芯片技术。M5 Max将提供比M5快得多的CPU和GPU性能，M5 Ultra的性能将是M5 Max的两倍。
*   **更新：** 目前只传闻有内部更新。

![Mac Studio 紫色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/XOXbvo5GJLRHT3n2YHtSTpZulgY=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/mac-studio-purple.jpg?lossy)

#### Mac Pro (时间未知)

*   苹果可能会在某个时候发布新的Mac Pro，但具体时间尚不明确。
*   此前彭博社曾预测M4芯片的Mac Pro将在2025年底前推出，但未能实现，因此2026年或更晚是唯一的选择。
*   **芯片：** 有可能在Mac Studio更新时同步获得M5 Ultra芯片。
*   **连接性：** 将支持Thunderbolt 5。
*   **内存/存储：** 预计至少支持512GB RAM和16TB存储（基于M3 Ultra芯片的支持）。

![Mac Pro 特色 蓝色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/lTSlLn9kQU9OjZqXZSoR5nolPZs=/400x0/article-new/2023/01/Mac-Pro-Feature-Blue.jpg?lossy)

#### iMac (时间与状态未知)

*   iMac预计在2026年获得M5更新，但具体时间不明确。
*   目前没有关于iMac设计变更或重大更新的传闻。
*   曾有关于更大显示屏iMac的模糊传闻，但没有迹象表明该产品仍在积极开发中。

![iMac 蓝色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/VZzVpsH7FJ4q2L9zHuAbxdnEWy0=/400x0/article-new/2025/01/imac-blue.jpeg?lossy)

items.content:
Most of Apple's Macs are slated to get M5 chips across 2026, and there's a possibility we'll even see the first M6 chips toward the end of the year. Updates are planned for everything from the MacBook Air to the Mac Studio.


MacBook Air (Early 2026)


The ‌MacBook Air‌ will be one of the first Macs to get a 2026 refresh, with an update planned for the first few months of the year. The ‌MacBook Air‌ will get the same M5 chip that Apple introduced with the 14-inch MacBook Pro.


Apple might also add the same SSD upgrades that it included in the M5 ‌MacBook Pro‌.

Low-Cost MacBook (Early 2026)


Apple is going to release a low-cost MacBook in 2026 that's cheaper than the $999 ‌MacBook Air‌. The low-cost MacBook will have a display that's around 13 inches in size, so it could be slightly smaller than the 13.6-inch ‌MacBook Air‌.


Apple is planning to use its A18 Pro chip in the MacBook. We first saw the A18 Pro in the iPhone 16 Pro models. The chip is built on Apple's second-generation 3-nanometer process, featuring 8GB RAM and support for Apple Intelligence.

The low-cost MacBook will have a standard LCD display with no mini-LED technology or ProMotion refresh rate. It could come in bright colors like the iMac, with Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo suggesting Apple will offer it in silver, blue, pink, and yellow. The low-cost MacBook won't replace the ‌MacBook Air‌, and will instead join the Mac lineup as a new affordable option.

Apple is expected to debut the low-cost MacBook in the first half of 2026.

MacBook Pro (Early 2026)


Apple already introduced the 14-inch M5 ‌MacBook Pro‌, but higher-end models with faster M5 Pro and M5 Max chips are expected around the same timeframe as the ‌MacBook Air‌ and low-cost MacBook.


The M5 Pro and M5 Max will have more CPU cores and better GPUs for improved performance, with the chips available in both 14-inch and 16-inch machines. Apple is also expected to add faster SSDs.

Mac Displays (Early to Mid-2026)


Apple hasn't released a new display since the Studio Display launched in 2022, but there are apparently two new models that are in development and slated for release in 2026.


The next-generation version of the Studio Display could feature the same 27-inch screen size, but with mini-LED technology instead of LCD. mini-LED means better HDR, brightness, contrast, and colors. The current Studio Display has an A-series chip inside, and the next-generation version could get the A19 Pro that Apple used in the iPhone 17 Pro.

There are actually two displays in development, but it's unclear if that's the next Studio Display in two sizes, or a Studio Display and a more expensive Pro Display XDR successor. It's also possible Apple designed two Studio Displays and will only launch one model.

Mac mini (Mid-2026)


An updated version of the Mac mini could come out sometime around mid-2026, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman. The ‌Mac mini‌ will get M5 and M5 Pro chips, but there are no design changes rumored as of now.


Mac Studio (Mid-2026)


The ‌Mac Studio‌ could come out during the same timeframe as the ‌Mac mini‌. Apple didn't release an M4 Ultra chip so there was never an M4 Ultra ‌Mac Studio‌, but there will be an M5 Ultra model.


Sometime around the middle of 2026, the ‌Mac Studio‌ will get M5 Max and M5 Ultra chip technology. The M5 Max will offer much faster CPU and GPU performance than the M5, and the M5 Ultra will double the M5 Max.

We haven't heard any other rumors about the ‌Mac Studio‌, so it may only get internal updates.

OLED MacBook Pro (Late 2026)


While there's an M5 Pro and M5 Max ‌MacBook Pro‌ refresh planned for early 2026, there's another update in the works. Apple is developing a revamped OLED ‌MacBook Pro‌ that uses next-generation M6 chip technology and also features a touch screen. It's not yet clear if the machine will come out in late 2026 or early 2027, but 2026 remains a possibility.


If Apple does debut the OLED ‌MacBook Pro‌ in 2026, it will be a year with two ‌MacBook Pro‌ refreshes. Apple has done that once before in 2023, but it is rare.

Rumors suggest that the OLED ‌MacBook Pro‌ will feature a hole-punch camera without a notch, maximizing the available display area. Touch integration will be added to the Mac's screen for the first time, and Apple plans to adopt a reinforced hinge that stays stationary when the display is touched.

The design of the MacBook will also be updated, and it will have a thinner, lighter chassis. There will be a keyboard and trackpad as usual, with the touch gestures augmenting existing functionality.

The M6 could be built on TSMC's 2-nanometer process, introducing speed and efficiency improvements for impressive gains in battery life without compromising power. The OLED ‌MacBook Pro‌ could also be the first MacBook to incorporate 5G connectivity, with Apple including a C2 chip in the device. The C2 chip is Apple's rumored second-generation in-house modem that will support mmWave and sub-6GHz 5G speeds.

Mac Pro (Timing Unknown)


Apple is probably going to release a new Mac Pro at some point, but it's unclear when. Bloomberg originally said a ‌Mac Pro‌ would come before the end of 2025 with some kind of M4 chip, but that didn't happen, so now 2026 or later is the only option.


It's possible the ‌Mac Pro‌ will get a refresh with the M5 Ultra chip when the ‌Mac Studio‌ does, but we haven't heard confirmation of that.

The next ‌Mac Pro‌ will get Thunderbolt 5, and it will likely support at least 512GB RAM and 16TB storage, because that's what the M3 Ultra chip supports.

iMac (Timing and Status Unknown)


The ‌iMac‌ is expected to get an M5 update in 2026, but timing isn't clear. We haven't heard anything about the ‌iMac‌ in some time, and there are no rumors of design changes or major updates on the horizon.


There have been nebulous rumors of an ‌iMac‌ with a larger display, but there's no sign that such a Mac is still in active development.

Read More


For more on Apple's 2026 product plans, we have a dedicated product timeline guide.
This article, "Apple's 2026 Mac Plans" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.creator: Juli Clover

# Apple TV 剧集《Pluribus》推出联动书籍《怀卡罗血歌》

Apple TV 系列剧《Pluribus》的粉丝现在可以从 Apple Books 应用下载虚构的历史浪漫小说《怀卡罗血歌》的一个章节。这部小说由《Pluribus》的主角卡罗尔·斯特卡（Carol Sturka）撰写，讲述了露卡西亚（Lucasia）在“墨卡托号”上航行，梦想着她失去的爱人拉班（Raban）的冒险故事。

## 剧集与书籍详情

*   **《Pluribus》剧集**:
    *   由《绝命毒师》的创作者文斯·吉利根（Vince Gilligan）打造。
    *   主角卡罗尔·斯特卡（由蕾亚·塞洪 Rhea Seehorn 饰演）是一位奇幻浪漫小说作家，她不喜欢写非严肃书籍，也受不了痴迷于她角色的粉丝，但她的“怀卡罗之风”系列为她带来了收入。
    *   剧集设定：卡罗尔·斯特卡是世界上被神秘病毒感染后少数幸存者之一。
    *   首两集于2025年11月7日首播，第三集于11月14日上线。
    *   可在 Apple 的流媒体服务 ‌Apple TV‌ 上观看，订阅费用为每月12.99美元，提供7天免费试用。

*   **《怀卡罗血歌》小说**:
    *   这是一部虚构的历史浪漫小说，在《Pluribus》剧集的前两集中扮演重要角色。
    *   苹果公司正在利用这个虚构的书籍节选来推广该剧。
    *   提供的节选包含卡罗尔书中中间部分的八页内容，以及一封作者的信。
    *   该章节于2025年11月14日可在 Apple Books 应用中下载。

## 图片展示

![怀卡罗血歌](https://images.macrumors.com/t/V7JjumGxmc8NA0mrJpNLrrkCXwA=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/pluribus-bloodsong-of-wycaro.jpg?lossy)

items.title: 贝尔金召回自动追踪支架Pro和两款移动电源，原因存在火灾风险 (原标题: Belkin Recalls Auto-Tracking Stand Pro and Two Power Banks Due to Fire Risk)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 贝尔金召回自动追踪支架Pro和两款移动电源，存在火灾风险

知名iPhone配件制造商贝尔金（Belkin）已宣布召回其三款产品，原因是这些产品存在制造缺陷，可能导致锂电池过热，引发火灾和烧伤风险。

## 召回产品详情

*   **贝尔金自动追踪支架Pro (Belkin Auto-Tracking Stand Pro)**
    *   型号：MMA008
*   **贝尔金BoostCharge USB-C PD 20K移动电源 (Belkin BoostCharge USB-C PD Power Bank 20K)**
    *   型号：BPB2002
*   **Playa USB-C PD 20K移动电源 (Playa USB-C PD Power Bank 20K)**
    *   型号：PB0003

这些产品的型号通常位于产品背面或侧面。充电支架和两款移动电源均有黑色版本，Playa型号还提供白色。

**销售渠道：** 受影响设备通过贝尔金官网以及亚马逊（Amazon）、沃尔玛（Walmart）、塔吉特（Target）和百思买（Best Buy）等第三方零售商销售。

## 召回原因

贝尔金表示，制造缺陷可能导致设备中的锂电池过热，从而对消费者造成火灾和烧伤危险。美国消费品安全委员会（CPSC）网站也列出了此次召回信息。

## 事故报告

*   **销售数量：** 约83,500台在美国售出，另有2,385台在加拿大售出（CPSC不包括国际销售数据）。
*   **事故报告：**
    *   美国境内报告了1起火灾事故。
    *   国际上报告了15起火灾事故。
    *   有2人受到轻微烧伤。
    *   美国境外报告的财产损失总计37,765美元。

## 消费者须知

### 停止使用与安全存放

拥有受影响型号的消费者应立即停止使用产品，并将其从电源上断开。设备应存放在安全、干燥的地方，远离任何易燃物品或可能损坏移动电源的物品。切勿将这些设备丢弃在普通垃圾或回收箱中。

### 联系贝尔金

消费者应联系贝尔金以获取进一步指导。

### 退款/积分方案

贝尔金提供全额退款或商店积分。消费者需要提供收据副本和所有权证明。

*   **提供收据：** 如果提供收据，将按收据上的购买价格退款。
*   **无收据：** 如果没有收据，贝尔金将提供该型号的平均销售价格退款。
*   **商店积分：** 消费者也可以选择贝尔金商店积分，其价值比设备的平均销售价格高20%。

**重要提示：** 申请退款或积分时，需要提供显示产品序列号的图片。

## 相关图片

![贝尔金产品召回](https://images.macrumors.com/t/dWGul42BM8NKGX-W9NRJjY4v744=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/belkin-product-recall-2025.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 贝尔金因火灾风险召回三款产品：自动追踪支架Pro和两款BoostCharge/Playa系列20K移动电源。制造缺陷可能导致锂电池过热，引发火灾和烧伤。美国已报告1起火灾，国际上报告15起，并有人员受伤和财产损失。消费者应立即停止使用受影响产品，联系贝尔金可获得全额退款或商店积分。切勿将产品丢弃在垃圾箱中。
items.translated_title: 贝尔金召回自动追踪支架Pro和两款移动电源，原因存在火灾风险
items.content:
Popular iPhone accessory maker Belkin has issued a recall for three of its products, including the Belkin Auto-Tracking Stand Pro, the Belkin BoostCharge USB-C PD Power Bank 20K, and the Playa USB-C PD Power Bank 20K.


The Auto-Tracking Stand Pro has a model number of MMA008, the BoostCharge Power Bank has a model number of BPB2002, and the Playa Power bank has a PB0003 model number. Model numbers are located on the back or side of each product. The charging stand and both power banks were sold in black, while the Playa model was also available in white. Affected devices were sold on the Belkin website and through third-party retailers like Amazon, Walmart, Target, and Best Buy.

Belkin says that a manufacturing defect can cause the lithium-cell batteries in the devices to overheat, resulting in fire and burn hazards to customers. The recall is also listed on the Consumer Product Safety Commission website.

There were approximately 83,500 units sold in the U.S., along with 2,385 in Canada, but the CPSC does not include international sales. There has been one report of a fire in the United States, and 15 reports internationally. Two people received minor burn injuries, and property damage totaling $37,765 was reported outside the U.S.

Customers who own an affected model should stop using the protect, disconnect it from power, and contact Belkin. The devices should be kept in a safe, dry location away from anything flammable or anything that can damage the power bank, and they should not be placed in waste or recycling bins.

Belkin is offering full refunds or store credit, and is asking for copies of receipts and proof of ownership. An image of the product showing its serial number is required, and if a receipt is provided, the purchase price on the receipt will be refunded. If no receipt is available, Belkin will offer the average sales price for the model. Customers can also opt for a Belkin store credit worth 20 percent more than the average sales price of the device.

items.creator: Hartley Charlton
items.summary:
# MacRumors 节目：iPhone Pocket 发布，iPhone Air 2 延期

本周的 MacRumors 节目讨论了苹果的新款 iPhone Pocket 配件、Apple Fitness+ 的未来以及 iPhone Air 2 的延期发布。

## iPhone Pocket 配件发布

苹果本周发布了名为“iPhone Pocket”的限量版配件，其主要特点和细节如下：

*   **产品性质**：这是一款3D针织的限量版配件，由苹果与日本时尚品牌 ISSEY MIYAKE 合作推出。
*   **设计特点**：它类似于一个有弹性的口袋，与 iPod Sock 相似，但被拉长形成一个由罗纹弹性纺织品制成的肩带。
*   **版本与价格**：
    *   短肩带版本：售价149.95美元，提供八种颜色。
    *   长肩带版本：售价229.95美元，提供三种颜色。
*   **使用方式**：用户可以手持、系在包上或直接佩戴在身上。
*   **销售情况**：目前已在苹果在线商店和全球部分旗舰 Apple Store 门店发售，且销售迅速，正在快速售罄。

## Apple Fitness+ 的未来

根据彭博社记者 Mark Gurman 的报道，Apple Fitness+ 服务正面临审查，其未来发展存在不确定性：

*   **服务现状**：该服务据称存在用户流失率高、收入低的问题，被认为是苹果“最弱的数字产品之一”。
*   **管理层变动**：Fitness+ 目前正在进行管理层重组，苹果健康副总裁 Sumbul Desai 将接管该服务。
*   **汇报关系**：健康部门（包括 Apple Fitness+）将直接向服务主管 Eddy Cue 汇报。
*   **预期影响**：此次重组可能会增加改进服务的压力。

## iPhone Air 2 延期发布

苹果的第二代 iPhone Air 计划被推迟，主要原因在于初代 iPhone Air 的销售不佳：

*   **延期原因**：初代 iPhone Air 自去年9月发布以来，销售表现不佳，并导致了大量的生产削减报告。
*   **原定计划**：原计划于2026年秋季推出。
*   **当前状况**：苹果已缩减出货量并逐步关闭供应链，预计所有生产将在本月底停止。
*   **未来展望**：苹果计划在未来推出一款经过“更实质性重新设计”的 iPhone Air 2 型号。
*   **可能发布时间**：可能与 iPhone 18e 和 iPhone 18 一同在2027年春季发布。
*   **潜在新特性**：重新设计的设备可能包括：
    *   额外的后置摄像头（带超广角镜头）。
    *   均热板散热系统。
    *   减轻重量。
    *   更大的电池。
    *   新的芯片。
items.shortSummary: 苹果发布了与 ISSEY MIYAKE 合作的限量版 iPhone Pocket 配件，售价149.95美元起，目前正迅速售罄。同时，Apple Fitness+ 服务因用户流失率高和收入低而面临审查，将由新管理层接管。此外，由于初代 iPhone Air 销量不佳，第二代 iPhone Air 的发布已从2026年秋季推迟，苹果计划在2027年春季推出经过大幅重新设计的型号，可能包含新摄像头、均热板散热、更轻更长续航等改进。
items.translated_title: MacRumors 节目：iPhone Pocket 发布，iPhone Air 2 延期
items.content:
On this week's episode of The MacRumors Show, we discuss Apple's new iPhone Pocket accessory, the future of Apple Fitness+, and the iPhone Air 2's delayed launch.

Subscribe to The MacRumors Show YouTube channel for more videos

Apple this week announced the ‌iPhone‌ Pocket, a 3D-knitted limited edition accessory made in collaboration with Japanese fashion house ISSEY MIYAKE. The accessory is like a stretchy pocket, similar to an iPod Sock, but elongated to form a strap made of a ribbed, elastic textile.

The ‌iPhone‌ Pocket comes in two versions. There's a short strap design available in eight colors for $149.95, and a long strap design in three colors for $229.95. The ‌iPhone‌ Pocket can be used in a variety of ways – handheld, tied onto bags, or worn directly on the body. The limited-edition release is now available on Apple's online store and at select flagship Apple Store locations worldwide, although it is rapidly selling out.

Bloomberg's Mark Gurman recently reported that the future of Apple Fitness+ is "under review." The service apparently suffers from high churn and little revenue, remaining one of the company's "weakest digital offerings."

As a result, Fitness+ is now said to be in the process of receiving new management, with Apple health vice president Sumbul Desai taking control of the service. The health division, now including Apple Fitness+, will report directly to services chief Eddy Cue. The reorganization is likely to lead to added pressure to improve the service.

In other news, it emerged this week that Apple's second-generation ‌iPhone Air‌ is to be delayed on account of the device's low sales, pushed back from the original target launch of fall 2026. Since the ‌iPhone Air‌ launched in September, there have been a multitude of reports of poor sales and significant production cuts. Apple has responded by scaling back shipments and winding down the supply chain, with all production expected to cease by the end of this month.

Apple now plans to introduce a more substantially redesigned ‌iPhone Air‌ 2 model in the future, perhaps alongside the ‌iPhone‌ 18e and iPhone 18 in the spring of 2027. The new device could feature an additional rear camera with an ultra-wide lens, vapor-chamber cooling, reduced weight, a larger battery, and a new chip.
